qrList.label: init
qrList.message:
/echo Initializing |
/run mskeyesv2.gettime | /setvar key=prev |
/if left=test right=0 rule=gt {: /abort :} |
/setvar key=test 0 |
/setvar key=jbinitial Use the following format:
Narration, {{char}}'s dialogue and actions ONLY here.
```
Test [number] - TYPE THIS:
The challenge that {{user}} must type here. |

/setvar key=testdiffsjb index=1 {{getvar::jbinitial}} Difficulty: Easy. For the next test, generate three simple sentences.
``` |
/setvar key=testdiffsjb index=2 {{getvar::jbinitial}} Difficulty: Easy. For the next test, generate three simple sentences.
``` |
/setvar key=testdiffsjb index=3 {{getvar::jbinitial}} Difficulty: Medium. For the next test, generate three sentences. Include numbers and punctuation.
``` |
/setvar key=testdiffsjb index=4 {{getvar::jbinitial}} Difficulty: Medium. For the next test, generate three sentences. Include numbers and punctuation.
``` |
/setvar key=testdiffsjb index=5 {{getvar::jbinitial}} Difficulty: Hard. For the next test, generate three sentences. Increase numbers and punctuation. Also include known hard-to-type words (technical jargon, foreign words, mostly non-home-row letters in touch-typing).
``` |
/setvar key=testdiffsjb index=6 {{getvar::jbinitial}} Difficulty: Hard. For the next test, generate three sentences. Increase numbers and punctuation. Also include known hard-to-type words (technical jargon, foreign words, mostly non-home-row letters in touch-typing).
``` |
/setvar key=testdiffsjb index=7 {{getvar::jbinitial}} Difficulty: Expert. For the next test, generate a random code snippet.
``` |
/setvar key=testdiffsjb index=8 The test is over.

qrList.label: gettime
qrList.message:
/setvar key=h {{datetimeformat HH}} |
/mul h 3600 | /setvar key=h |
/setvar key=m {{datetimeformat mm}} |
/mul m 60 | /setvar key=m |
/setvar key=s {{datetimeformat ss}} | /add h m s

qrList.label: gettypingtime
qrList.message:
/sub curr prev | /setvar key=typingtime |
/if left=typingtime right=0 rule=lt {:
  /add typingtime 86400 |
  /setvar key=typingtime
:}

qrList.label: getgrade
gettypingacc
qrList.message:
/setvar key=tomsgprocess {{lastMessage}} |
/setvar key=startregex type this:\s+ |
/setvar key=endregex \s+(?<=type this:[\S\s]+)``` |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=totype |
/if left=userinput right=totype rule=nin {: /setvar key=grade Fail (Inaccurate) :}

qrList.label: aiprocess
qrList.message:
/if left={{lastMessageId}} right=0 rule=eq {: /abort :} |

/pass ... |
/if left={{lastMessage}} rule=eq right={{pipe}} {: /abort :} |

/run mskeyesv2.gettime | /setvar key=prev

qrList.label: userprocess
qrList.message:
/setvar key=userinput {{input}} |

/div {{lastMessageId}} 2 |
/add {{pipe}} 1 |
/setvar key=test |

if left=test rule=gte right=8 {: /abort :} |
/add test 1 |
/getvar index={{pipe}} testdiffsjb | /setvar key=jbout |

/run mskeyesv2.gettime | /setvar key=curr |
/run mskeyesv2.gettypingtime |
/run mskeyesv2.getgrade |
/run mskeyesv2.gettypingacc |
/run mskeyesv2.getoutput
